name: Heroes: Pocket Arena
description:
[Heroes: Pocket Arena] Enjoy MOBA(Multiplayer Online Battle Arena) game with multi-national users, real-time, on your mobile devices.
Exciting 3vs3 or single matches lasting 3~5 min Max.
Experience diverse & fancy skills from each character and choose one that suits you the best!
Invite your friends to play for more fun!

[Game Features]
- Real-time battle with users from all over the world - Various game modes and maps with individual or 3vs3 matches
- Numerous characters and fancy skills at each level
- Upgrade your character by collecting gold and character cards
- Plenty of rewards offered for daily quests and achievements
- Determine your position with Weekly rank and league system


[Mode Description]
- Smash & Grab (3vs3): Collect 10 Jewels being dropped at regular interval at the center and hold 15 seconds to win.
- Defense (3vs3): The team that removes the opponent's base first wins.
- Battle Royal (Single match): Eliminate all others, the last user surviving wins.
- More interesting modes to be updated.
